title: Phishing/Scam
selftext:
So,someone has done something to my dad's account and ammount is being taken out
This has happened twice yesterday my dad reported the first incident to the bank and today the second incident took place bank has asked 5days of time,what to do?
comments:
AEPS stands for aadhar enabled payment system
 Your father biometrics are compromised, disable them on aadhar website immediately
